name: The Platformer Game (downloadable)
description: You are a cute bunny that goes round a large world collecting carrots. But It is not easy. There are enemies (cute but deadly blobs) and spikes as well. Luckily you have three lives though. But don't waste them.  There are also a variety of powerups, some hidden, some in plain sight. To win the game you collect all the carrots. Good luck! ;)
